note.p: Death: His residence, Quarry House, St Leonards-on-Sea, Sussex (16 August 1882)

Career: Entered the public service (1812); sent to Sicily (1814); sent to the Ionian Islands (1816); Commissioner and Consul General, Buenos Aires (1824); concluded treaty of amity with the newly independent Argentina (1825); Charge d'affaires, Buenos Aires (1825-1832); Chief Commissioner, Naples (1840-1848); Presented remains of Megatherium to the Royal College of Surgeons
